org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl

类 BufferImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl.BufferImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Buffer
    直接已知子类:
    X_C_TYPE_Impl, X_COMMON_Impl, X_OCTET_Impl

    public abstract class BufferImpl
extends Object
implements Serializable, Buffer
    This class is used to send and receive data to and from clients to services.
    另请参阅:
    X_OCTET_Impl, X_C_TYPE_Impl, X_COMMON_Impl, 序列化表格

        public void deserialize(byte[] data)
                 throws ConnectionException
        Deserialize the buffer.
        参数:
        data - The data to deserialize.
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - In case the data does not match the format defined.

      • serialize

                 throws ConnectionException
        Serialize the buffer.
        返回:
        The byte array for sending.
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - In case the data cannot be formatted correctly
